DOC.brief_summary: Aim of this prospective randomized study is to assess the safety and efficacy of video-assisted lung segmentectomy (Group B) comparing with mini muscle-sparing thoracotomy (group A) during diagnostic process for pulmonary nodules.
DOC.brief_title: Fast Track Rehabilitation Following Video-assisted Lung Segmentectomy
DOC.criteria: Patients with undiagnosed multiple pulmonary nodules Centrally located lesions previous thoracotomy extensive lung consolidation, and inability to achieve one lung ventilation
